channel.title: Can't post server on server list?
channel.description:
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = '72.167.49.170' OR `ipfield` = '72.167.49.170'' at line 1
Get this error?
